title: Question:
author: JorgCres
created_time: July 02, 2022, 06:58:54 PMLast edit: August 25, 2022, 01:02:00 PM by JorgCres
content: Is anyone interested in buying a Kialara Exogenesis? https://ibb.co/DY8qtGF

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: R u selling ? Have you got any pics ?

comments.author: JorgCres
comments.body: I'm new here. How do you add pics here?

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Have a look at this sales guide thread over in collectibles  - it will give you all the advice you need including details on how to post images  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5277761.40

comments.author: JorgCres
comments.body: Quote from: JorgCres on July 02, 2022, 06:58:54 PMIs anyone interested in buying a Kialara Exogenesis? https://ibb.co/DY8qtGF

comments.author: wheelz1200
comments.body: A couple pointers.  You are new here, offer to use a reputable escrow here on the forum otherwise you likely won't be able to sell here.  Let people know where you are shipping from.  And lastly this is fine in goods, but these types of pieces are better viewed in the collectable sub here.  Good luck with your sale

comments.author: JorgCres
comments.created_time: August 28, 2022, 06:23:48 PMLast edit: September 04, 2022, 07:12:20 PM by JorgCres
comments.body: Hello I am selling Kialara Exogenesis Silver Series 2021I have pics of the itemI'm looking to sell for $1000 or b/oI will be using escrow for the sale.The Kialara will be shipped from Kissimmee, FL USAhttps://ibb.co/DY8qtGFI need to fix my car that is why I am sellingThank you for looking.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: JorgCres on August 28, 2022, 06:23:48 PMHello I am selling Kialara Exogenesis Silver Series 2021I have pics of the itemI'm looking to sell for $1000 or b/oI will be using escrow for the sale.The Kialara will be shipped from Kissimmee, FL USAhttps://ibb.co/DY8qtGFI need to fix my car that is why I am sellingThank you for looking.You should repost this in the Collectibles section: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=217.0

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: hello fellow Floridian! I would do as the others above have suggested and post this in the collectibles area!

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: OP has done , but hasn’t quite got the concept  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5411187.msg60820657#msg60820657Post a nice pick with your username and date next to the Kialara. Perhaps a bit more effort is required by the OP in order to sell with trust
